task.title: Installing Euca2ools on Mac OS X
task.shortdesc: This task shows you how to install Euca2ools on Mac OS X.

taskbody.context: To install Euca2ools on Mac OS X:

step.cmd: Download and extract the Euca2ools tar file from http://downloads.eucalyptus.com/software/euca2ools//source/euca2ools-.tar.xz
Extract the Euca2ools tar file and change to the euca2ools directory:

step.note: If you have Xcode installed, be sure to install the Xcode command line tools by opening the Xcode Preferences menu, selecting Downloads, selecting Components, and then clicking the Install button next to Command Line Tools in the components list. If you are using Mavericks, go to Install Command Line Tools In OSX 10.9 Mavericks [ How - To ] for this information.
